nodes.text: The Perpendicular Universe Fair was a fair where the Find Your Equilibrium contest was held annually, with the sponsorship of three times Xaf award-winning horticultural educator Kaat Thrick-Thrick.

The Perpendicular Universe Fair was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
